our story

About us

Looking for the best barber shop in Pokhara? Kapalsome’s your one-stop shop for ditching boring cuts and getting awesome styles since 2016!

Short on the sides? Fancy style?  We do it all!  We are best barber in pokhara and we provide barber training class as well.

Local or tourist, everyone is welcome at Kapalsome! Ditch the bad hair days and come hang out in our chill atmosphere. We guarantee you’ll walk out feeling confident, stylish, and ready to conquer Pokhara with your fresh new look!
